bullets.text: Government shutdown likely cements further Fed rate cuts as missing data clouds policy decisions.
ADP reports private payrolls fell 32,000 in September, signaling weakening labor demand amid uncertainty.
Supreme Court lets Governor Lisa Cook remain at Fed until January arguments, maintaining FOMC continuity.
Trump freezes $18B for New York-area transit projects, threatening delays, construction jobs, and bond-funded timelines.
Administration cancels nearly $8B in climate funding to blue states, reshaping regional investment pipelines.
Regulators remind lenders on NFIP lapse compliance; flood-zone mortgages could stall without insurance availability.
SK Hynix and Samsung surge after OpenAI partnership news, highlighting AI-driven memory demand.
Intel jumps as talks progress to add AMD as foundry customer, bolstering IDM 2.0 strategy.
Amazon launches sub-$5 grocery brand, intensifying price competition and private-label pressure.
GM, Ford post record EV sales; U.S. Q3 sales up 8%, signaling resilient consumer demand.
Israel escalates Gaza offensive, intercepts aid flotilla, elevating regional geopolitical risk.
JWST detects possible atmosphere on potentially habitable exoplanet, advancing exoplanet biosignature search.
AI designs first functional genome, a bacteriophage, accelerating synthetic biology and drug discovery timelines.
AI model DOLPHIN identifies hundreds of hidden cancer markers, promising earlier, more precise diagnostics.
Stablecoins poised to enable in-store payments, potentially lowering fees and reshaping merchant acceptance.
